title: Define the word : Vocabulary Builder
features: simple and user friendly user interface
description: Fun and addictive.Given a definition, find the correct word.A great way to build your vocabulary while having fun at the same time.Define the word is aimed at building your vocabulary in a fun way.this game has lots of common SAT and GRE words for you to learn. There are over 1300+ words and definition to learn and have fun withEnjoy!
